nav.css: html{font-family:sans-serif;-ms-text-size-adjust:100%;-webkit-text-size-adjust:100%;}body{margin:0;}article,aside,details,figcaption,figure,footer,header,hgroup,main,menu,nav,section,summary{display:block;}audio,canvas,progress,video{display:inline-block;vertical-align:baseline;}audio:not([controls]){display:none;height:0;}[hidden],template{display:none;}a{background-color:transparent;}a:active,a:hover{outline:0;}abbr[title]{border-bottom:1px dotted;}b,strong{font-weight:bold;}dfn{font-style:italic;}h1{font-size:2em;margin:0.67em 0;}mark{background:#ff0;color:#000;}small{font-size:80%;}sub,sup{font-size:75%;line-height:0;position:relative;vertical-align:baseline;}sup{top:-0.5em;}sub{bottom:-0.25em;}img{border:0;}svg:not(:root){overflow:hidden;}figure{margin:1em 40px;}hr{-moz-box-sizing:content-box;box-sizing:content-box;height:0;}pre{overflow:auto;}code,kbd,pre,samp{font-family:monospace,monospace;font-size:1em;}button,input,optgroup,select,textarea{color:inherit;font:inherit;margin:0;}button{overflow:visible;}button,select{text-transform:none;}button,html input[type="button"],input[type="reset"],input[type="submit"]{-webkit-appearance:button;cursor:pointer;}button[disabled],html input[disabled]{cursor:default;}button::-moz-focus-inner,input::-moz-focus-inner{border:0;padding:0;}input{line-height:normal;}input[type="checkbox"],input[type="radio"]{box-sizing:border-box;padding:0;}input[type="number"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,input[type="number"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button{height:auto;}input[type="search"]{-webkit-appearance:textfield;-moz-box-sizing:content-box;-webkit-box-sizing:content-box;box-sizing:content-box;}input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-decoration{-webkit-appearance:none;}fieldset{border:1px solid #c0c0c0;margin:0 2px;padding:0.35em 0.625em 0.75em;}legend{border:0;padding:0;}textarea{overflow:auto;}optgroup{font-weight:bold;}table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;}td,th{padding:0;}a{text-decoration:none;}li{list-style:none;}body.mobile-nav-open #ibm-cloud-mobile-nav{left:0;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop{display:none;}@media (min-width: 1200px){#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop{display:block;}}@media (min-width: 1200px){#ibm-cloud-nav .mobile{display:none;}}#ibm-cloud-nav{width:100%;background-color:#0489bd;float:none;font-family:Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-weight:300;letter-spacing:0.5px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-links{max-width:960px;margin:0 auto;height:50px;overflow:hidden;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link{display:none;height:50px;line-height:50px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link>a{height:50px;line-height:50px;position:relative;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box;}@media (min-width: 1200px){#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link{display:inline-block;}}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link.cloud-logo-container{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link .active{border-bottom:4px solid #83cff1;color:#fff;margin:0 0 0 20px;padding:0 20px 0 0;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link>a:before{content:'';width:0;height:0;position:absolute;top:23px;right:0;border-color:#83cff1 transparent transparent;border-width:6px;border-style:solid;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link:hover>a:before{top:18px;border-width:5px;border-color:transparent transparent #fff;}#ibm-cloud-nav .desktop-link,#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container{height:50px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container{float:left;width:55px;margin-right:5px;}@media (min-width: 1200px){#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container{background:#0d79a3;padding:0;width:100px;}}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container a{display:block;width:90%;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo-container img{width:100%;box-sizing:container-box;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-logo{height:50px;width:100px;}#ibm-cloud-nav .ibm-cloud-logo{width:120px;margin-bottom:-4px;}#ibm-cloud-nav ul{padding:0;}#ibm-cloud-nav li{list-style:none;float:left;line-height:30.012px;text-align:left;}#ibm-cloud-nav li a{color:#83cff1;text-decoration:none;display:block;padding:0 20px;position:relative;}#ibm-cloud-nav li:hover{background:#0489bd;}#ibm-cloud-nav li a:hover{color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-nav li ul{position:absolute;display:none;padding:20px 0 30px;background-color:#01344f;overflow:hidden;}#ibm-cloud-nav li:hover ul{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-nav li li{border-bottom:1px solid #002337;clear:both;float:none;display:block;width:100%;padding:6px 0;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav{position:fixed;top:0;left:-250px;width:250px;height:100%;background:#333;overflow:scroll;z-index:100;background:#01344f;-webkit-transition:all ease-out 0.4s;-moz-transition:all ease-out 0.4s;transition:all ease-out 0.4s;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-nav-toggle{display:block;margin:20px;padding:0;width:20px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link:first-child{margin-bottom:20px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link>a{font-size:1rem;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.local{border-top:1px solid #004a71;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.local a{border-bottom:1px solid #004a71;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.global{background:#012a40;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.global a{border-bottom:1px solid #01344f;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active{border-bottom:1px solid #004a71;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active>a{color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active>a{color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link a:hover{background:#0489bd;color:#fff;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active ul{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active .chevron{position:relative;top:-14px;-webkit-transition:all ease-in-out 0.2s;-moz-transition:all ease-in-out 0.2s;transition:all ease-in-out 0.2s;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active .nested-mobile-link .chevron-wrapper .chevron{top:0;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link.active .nested-mobile-link.active .chevron-wrapper .chevron{top:-14px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .mobile-link ul{display:none;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link a{border:0;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active a{border-left:3px solid #83cff1;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link li{display:none;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link ul a{border:0 !important;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .nested-mobile-link.active li{display:block;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav .chevron-wrapper{float:right;width:20px;height:12px;overflow:hidden;margin-top:5px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav ul{margin:0;padding:0;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav li a{display:block;padding:8px 20px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav a{color:#83cff1;font-family:Helvetica Neue,Helvetica,sans-serif;font-size:0.9rem;font-weight:300;letter-spacing:0.5px;}#ibm-cloud-mobile-nav img{width:20px;}
